ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.ExecutionControlSetting__c.Run_Validation_Rule__c && AND(INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - In Compliance'), OR( INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODE - Not available'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODE - Not updated'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Not Requested'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Results Not Received'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - No Update'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Results Not Sent to Program'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Results Not Sent to State'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Results Not Onsite'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Returned, Not Resubmitted'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Rehired, No Update'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Conviction/Child Removed'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - No Rehabilitation Doc'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Previous employerâ€™s record on file'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Incomplete results'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Refused to be fingerprinted'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Pending verification'), INCLUDES(CLQ_FBI_Processed__c, 'ODJFS - Not Applicable') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'In Compliance' cannot be selected with any other reason for FBI Processed
